text: Get here early enough to have dinner.

Nice place. Great staff.  A fixture in the township forever

Always have something new on the inter menu, love trying new things here :)

Hot here too. Dang!

Great weather for eating outdoors. Good service.
Good service. Good concierge lounge with good dessert at night. Good location.
Just an overnight for work. The lounge and top management are great. Recommended!

The fried banana dessert is good

Not just comfort food, LIFE food. Yinz won't find a better sandwich joint.  The beer is cold and the crowd is loud.  Happy hour?  Four beers for ten bucks.  Where can you beat that?
Small interior, but good if you go with a large group and take over the joint!  Excellent bar staff!
Visiting from Florida, always our first stop even before seeing family!

First time stopping here on one of our trips from Florida to Pennsylvania and back.  Excellent!  Service was fast and food was great!  I know you would think this chain is good always but we have had our shares of bad locations, this one is awesome!!
Pgh staple.

Warning to all Yelpers...never buy anything here or contract any service.  Follow this simple rule, if you ever feel pressured, trapped or scared while buying anything, DON'T BUY IT and leave immediately.  In this store, you're bound to feel all of these emotions at some point.
Recommend reservations as they can get a little busy. Also recommend the happy hour. The pork nachos are fantastic.
The spicy green beans is an amazing side. Try it!
Mmm... Take out! Order online and pickup on your way home!
The salsa is delicious... Plan to eat a lot!
Best salsa!  You'll need some to take home!
When you get the chicken, don't skip the wing, its the best part!
Order extra gravy. Its the best thing ever!
Get the ice tea with raspberries, they add the fresh berries right in your glass, no fake additives here, only the real thing.
Still delicious!

Add an ice tea for lunch, it's the real thing here.
Use the online check in. Its great. I checked in, shopped next door and walked over at the estimated time. I almost felt bad skipping the huge crowd of people there.

Summer hours: closed Saturday through Labor Day.
Happy hour here is great!
Good value for a quick soda in the airport.
